title: Start
description: You wake up in a dark room. The sound of machinery can be heard around you. There is a small table with a brown box on it , and a door in in the direction of what you think is north..

title: Double doored room
description: You are in a room with two doors, one to the west and one to the east.

title: Dark room
description: You are in a dark room. There is a man lying on his stomach on the floor. A gun is lying besides him. There is a door to the north

title: Empty room
description: You are in a room that appears to be empty.

title: Dim lit room
description: You are in a dim lit room. There are bunk bed by the walls. One of the bunk beds has a ball of blankets on it, and one can hear a wheezing-noice coming from it.
